mapper.select: select sido_code as code, sido_name as name from sido
select sigungu_code as code, sigungu_name as name, latitude, longitude from sigungu where sido_code = #{sido_code} order by sigungu_name
select dong_code as code, dong_name as name, latitude, longitude from dong where sigungu_code = #{sigungu_code} order by dong_name
select sigungu_code as code, sigungu_name as name, latitude, longitude from sigungu where sigungu_code = #{sigungu_code}

Select c.sido_name as si, b.sigungu_name as sig, a.dong_name as emd from dong a, sigungu b, sido c where c.SIDO_CODE = b.SIDO_CODE and b.SIGUNGU_CODE = (select sigungu_code from dong where dong_code = #{dong_code1}) and a.DONG_CODE = #{dong_code2}

SELECT SIG.SIGUNGU_CODE as code, SIG.SIGUNGU_NAME as name, SIG.LATITUDE as latitude, SIG.LONGITUDE as longitude, COUNT(*) as storeNum FROM SIGUNGU SIG, STORE STR WHERE SIG.SIGUNGU_CODE = STR.SIGUNGU_CODE and TO_NUMBER(SIG.LATITUDE) BETWEEN ${lat1} and ${lat2} AND TO_NUMBER(SIG.LONGITUDE) BETWEEN ${lng1} and ${lng2} GROUP by SIG.SIGUNGU_CODE, SIG.SIGUNGU_NAME, SIG.LATITUDE, SIG.LONGITUDE

SELECT DNG.DONG_CODE as code, DNG.DONG_NAME as name, DNG.LATITUDE as latitude, DNG.LONGITUDE as longitude, COUNT(*) as storeNum FROM DONG DNG, STORE STR WHERE DNG.DONG_CODE = STR.DONG_CODE and TO_NUMBER(DNG.LATITUDE) BETWEEN ${lat1} and ${lat2} AND TO_NUMBER(DNG.LONGITUDE) BETWEEN ${lng1} and ${lng2} GROUP by DNG.DONG_CODE, DNG.DONG_NAME, DNG.LATITUDE, DNG.LONGITUDE
